description: Profiler domain exposes JavaScript evaluation timing and profiling.

properties.name: name
properties.description: A displayable name for the stack frame. i.e function name, (program), etc.

properties.name: stackFrames
properties.description: First array item is the bottom of the call stack and last array item is the top of the call stack.

properties.name: totalTime
properties.description: Total execution time of the profiler's data. (Note: not total elapsed time.)

parameters.name: includeSamples
parameters.description: Start the sampling profiler, defaults to false.

commands.name: stopTracking
commands.description: Stop tracking script evaluations. This will produce a `trackingComplete` event.

events.name: trackingUpdate
events.description: While tracking is enabled the backend will periodically update the frontend with event data. The data includes tuples.

events.name: trackingComplete
events.description: When tracking is complete the backend will send any buffered data, such as profiling information.
